title: How do you complete the "Watch and Earn" mission?
body: I have tried several times to complete this mission but every attempt i use it doesnt work. I have tried watching some of the worlds matches, logged in and out of league, re-installed league, I've tried watching the video several times. Please help me to resolve this issue as i want to proceed on completing all the missions.

replies.body:
For whatever reason it is very hard to complete it using chrome. If you watch it via firefox it will show up between 10-20minutes. 

Also if you have adblock on, disable it as it spams requests every 5-10 seconds which the  adblock might count it as a malicious ad.
Thank-you!! I will report back notifying you if this works!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

* Were you watching the embedded stream on https://watch.oce.lolesports.com ?
* Does the mission still show up on https://watch.oce.lolesports.com/rewards as normal?
* Have you tried switching streams? (You can switch between the Twitch and Youtube in the bottom right corner of the stream)
* Have you tried a different browser? (Some browsers aren't fully supported and may cause issues)
* Have you watched at least 10 minutes of the stream uninterrupted?
* How long ago did you complete the requirement? (Such missions can often take an hour or two to properly update)
* Have you tried watching for the 10 mins in fullscreen mode? (there is speculation this may help)
